verses.verse: The <S%H4853>burden<s%> of the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> which stretcheth <S%H5186>forth<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> and layeth the <S%H3245>foundation<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H3335>formeth<s%> the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> him.

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> <S%H595>I<s%> will <S%H7760>make<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> a <S%H5592>cup<s%> of <S%H7478>trembling<s%> unto <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> round <S%H5439>about,<s%> when they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> in the <S%H4692>siege<s%> <S%H1571>both<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

And in <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> will I <S%H7760>make<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> a <S%H4614>burdensome<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5971>people:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H6006>burden<s%> themselves with it shall be cut in <S%H8295>pieces,<s%> <S%H8295><s%> though <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>people<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> be gathered <S%H622>together<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> it.

In <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> I will <S%H5221>smite<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5483>horse<s%> with <S%H8541>astonishment,<s%> and his <S%H7392>rider<s%> with <S%H7697>madness:<s%> and I will <S%H6491>open<s%> <S%H853><s%> mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and will <S%H5221>smite<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5483>horse<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> with <S%H5788>blindness.<s%>

And the <S%H441>governors<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> shall <S%H559>say<s%> in their <S%H3820>heart,<s%> The <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> shall be my <S%H556>strength<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> their <S%H430>God.<s%>

In <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> will I <S%H7760>make<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H441>governors<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> like a <S%H3595>hearth<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> among the <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and like a <S%H3940>torch<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> in a <S%H5995>sheaf;<s%> and they shall <S%H398>devour<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> round <S%H5439>about,<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> and <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H8040>left:<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> shall be <S%H3427>inhabited<s%> <S%H5750>again<s%> in her own <S%H8478>place,<s%> even in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> also shall <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H168>tents<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H7223>first,<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> the <S%H8597>glory<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> and the <S%H8597>glory<s%> of the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> do <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1431>magnify<s%> themselves <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

In <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1598>defend<s%> <S%H1157><s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> and he that is <S%H3782>feeble<s%> among them at <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> as <S%H1732>David;<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> shall be as <S%H430>God,<s%> as the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them.

And it shall come to <S%H1961>pass<s%> in <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> that I will <S%H1245>seek<s%> to <S%H8045>destroy<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

And I will <S%H8210>pour<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> and <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H2580>grace<s%> and of <S%H8469>supplications:<s%> and they shall <S%H5027>look<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> <S%H853>me<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> they have <S%H1856>pierced,<s%> and they shall <S%H5594>mourn<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> him, as one <S%H4553>mourneth<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> his <S%H3173>only<s%> son, and shall be in <S%H4843>bitterness<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> him, as one that is in <S%H4843>bitterness<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> his <S%H1060>firstborn.<s%>

In <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall there be a <S%H1431>great<s%> <S%H4553>mourning<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> as the <S%H4553>mourning<s%> of <S%H1910>Hadadrimmon<s%> in the <S%H1237>valley<s%> of <S%H4023>Megiddon.<s%>

And the <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H5594>mourn,<s%> every <S%H4940>family<s%> <S%H4940><s%> <S%H905>apart;<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H905>apart,<s%> and their <S%H802>wives<s%> <S%H905>apart;<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> <S%H905>apart,<s%> and their <S%H802>wives<s%> <S%H905>apart;<s%>

The <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> <S%H905>apart,<s%> and their <S%H802>wives<s%> <S%H905>apart;<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of <S%H8097>Shimei<s%> <S%H905>apart,<s%> and their <S%H802>wives<s%> <S%H905>apart;<s%>
All <S%H3605><s%> the <S%H4940>families<s%> that <S%H7604>remain,<s%> every <S%H4940>family<s%> <S%H4940><s%> <S%H905>apart,<s%> and their <S%H802>wives<s%> <S%H905>apart.<s%>
